tabs.content:
//***********************************************************************************************************
// Here are two articles to help you get started with KQL:
// KQL reference guide - https://aka.ms/KQLguide
// SQL - KQL conversions - https://aka.ms/sqlcheatsheet
//***********************************************************************************************************

.create table CapacitySummaryEvents (
    Timestamp: datetime,
    CapacityId: string,
    CapacityName: string,
    Region: string,
    Sku: string,
    TotalCores: int,
    UsedCores: int,
    InteractiveDelayMs: real,
    InteractiveDelayThresholdMs: real,
    InteractiveDelayThresholdPercentage: real,
    BackgroundDelayMs: real,
    BackgroundDelayThresholdMs: real,
    BackgroundDelayThresholdPercentage: real,
    ThrottlingState: string,
    OverloadState: string,
    SmoothedUtilization: real,
    RawUtilization: real,
    EventType: string,
    RawJson: dynamic
)


// Use "take" to view a sample number of records in the table and check the data.
YOUR_TABLE_HERE
| take 100

// See how many records are in the table.
YOUR_TABLE_HERE
| count

// This query returns the number of ingestions per hour in the given table.
YOUR_TABLE_HERE
| summarize IngestionCount = count() by bin(ingestion_time(), 1h)
tabs.title: Tab
